Test Name: Duchenne/Becker Muscular Dystrophy (DMD gene) Large Deletion/Duplication Analysis
Specimen Type: DNA extracted from whole blood, saliva, or tissue
Purpose: To detect large deletions or duplications in the DMD gene for the diagnosis of Duchenne and Becker Muscular Dystrophies.
Container: EDTA blood tube or validated saliva/tissue collection container (for subsequent DNA extraction)
Equipment: Thermal cycler, capillary electrophoresis system, qPCR instrument or NGS sequencer
